cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset bug causes Wi-Fi network crashes with Android devices. Router stops broadcasting on 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, requiring daily reboots. 5GHz band has poor performance and connectivity issues. Frequent Wi-Fi drops and reboots required. Router fails under load, causing reboots. Router's 5GHz line works well, but 2.4GHz line has issues. Frequent Wi-Fi issues with Linksys routers. Router has poor range and speed performance. Router has poor Wi-Fi connectivity and requires frequent reboots. Router's Wi-Fi bands rarely work simultaneously.
cont.entity_b: Wireless security causes connectivity issues. Device disconnects frequently from wireless access point. Product has intermittent connectivity issues. Wireless connection is unreliable and choppy.

cont.entity_a: Easily modify firmware to include VPN. Router supports DD-WRT and OpenVPN for secure network setup. Router lacks advanced customization in basic firmware. OpenWRT installation provides vast customizability. Router has poor firmware support and frequent disconnections. Router works well with DD-WRT firmware for stability.
cont.entity_b: Device lacks modern firmware updates. Product is outdated, with firmware from 2005.

cont.entity_a: Router's setup wizard is problematic. Router setup is easy, but requires firmware upgrade. Router setup process is difficult and challenging. Router has limited range and challenging setup.
cont.entity_b: Installation wizard on CD is ineffective. Vista support is poor, requiring compatibility mode. Device is not compatible with Vista. Requires manual setup for proper function. Difficult installation process, but works well once set up. Device has a complex setup process. Product is not plug-and-play and requires network expertise.

cont.entity_a: Manages traffic from multiple devices without complaint. Provides excellent Wi-Fi coverage. Flawless Wi-Fi performance with multiple active devices. Router handles bandwidth well with multiple devices. Router provides good coverage and performance.
cont.entity_b: Device works well when installed correctly. Device works well with wired ethernet connection. Product works well with Windows XP but not Vista. Product works well with wired connection.

cont.entity_a: Good customer service, replaced faulty unit promptly. Customer service is unhelpful with router issues.
cont.entity_b: Technical support is unhelpful with installation issues.
Device is not compatible with Vista. Product is not compatible with Windows 7. Product works well with Windows XP but not Vista. Product is not compatible with newer operating systems.

cont.entity_a: Router runs hot and emits unpleasant odor.
cont.entity_b: Music link software is poorly designed but functional.

cont.entity_a: Offers an economical alternative to expensive flash routers.
Frequent reboots needed to maintain functionality. Firmware upgrade is necessary for stability.
cont.entity_b: Product burns out quickly and is unsupported.

cont.entity_a: Web-interface is easy to navigate. Router is easy to manage and control with app.
